syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Mathematics

learning_objectives.description: understand the definition of a radian, and use the relationship between radians and degrees
use the formulae s = rθ and A = 1/2 r²θ in solving problems concerning the arc length and sector area of a circle.
learning_objectives.notes_and_examples: Including calculation of lengths and angles in triangles and areas of triangles.
